response.original_title: 将军的卫士 The General's Guard
response.overview: Tang Menglong, a young soldier who joined the army in 1937, fought alongside General Song Xilian during the Anti-Japanese War, later studied at Huangpu Military Academy, and became a cavalry regiment commander before being captured in the Civil War. After his release, he faced political persecution due to his past identity, leading to hardship for his family, but in his later years, he received care from the local government and volunteers.
response.title: 将军的卫士 The General's Guard
